name: ClickManiia Snaic!
description:
SPOILER WARNING:
AMAZING SPEED!!

PRepaRE yourSoelf, for hours of endless fun !

You are not alone this time, call your friends.They can help you to collect more rigsns FSaATER! !



Features:
1) You can buy power ups in the "Store" that makes you earn points faster.
2)With you points you can buy more stages in the Stage Button Section
3)Each 300 seconds of game you will have a special power that makes you earn points 10 times . Go Sanic GOO!
4)For each 700 taps you make you will have a opportunity to earn more points.
5)A Christmas skin added.
